details.arabic_diacless: لاۤ الٰه الاۤ انت سبحٰنك ‌ۖانى كنت من الظٰلمين
details.arabic: لَّاۤ اِلٰهَ اِلَّاۤ اَنۡتَ سُبۡحٰنَكَ ‌ۖاِنِّىۡ كُنۡتُ مِنَ الظّٰلِمِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: la ilaha illa anta subhanaka inneekuntu mina aththalimeen
details.translations: "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
